word: Those who reject the life and character of Jesus, refusing to be like Him, declare themselves to be in controversy with God. \93He that is not with me is against me,\94 Christ declares, \93and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad.\94 Those who love God will not choose His enemies as their friends. The question is asked, \93Shouldest thou help the ungodly, and love them which hate the Lord?\94 True Christians will not choose the society of non-Christians.
